sentences.sContent: They were bowling along the motorway at sixty miles per hour.
sentences.sContent_eng: They were bowling along the motorway at sixty miles per hour.
sentences.sCn: 他们以每小时60英里的速度在高速公路上飞驰。

sentences.sContent: Several cars piled up after ignoring the fog warning on the motorway.
sentences.sContent_eng: Several cars piled up after ignoring the fog warning on the motorway.
sentences.sCn: 由于无视高速公路上的大雾警告，有好几辆汽车相撞。

synos.tran: [公路]高速公路，汽车高速公路

words.tran: 驾车旅行的人，开汽车的人
驾驶汽车；乘汽车经过（motor的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 高速公路，汽车高速公路
trans.tranOther: a very wide road for travelling fast over long distances, especially between cities
